name: MBA Backstage
description:
MBA Backstage is a new platform bringing something fresh to the MBA journey, offering independent advice and guidance from students and recent grads.

It also includes a Coaching Portal that acts as a market place for connecting applicants with coaches for help on MBA applications.

jobs.title: COO / Co-founder
jobs.description:
The exact COO role scope is not fully defined and can be moulded to suit a candidate that has a good personal and cultural fit, but the main responsibility is expected to be the Coaching Portal, which will be a marketplace that connects applicants with freelance coaches for help on MBA applications. 
 
Therefore the role would include:
	• Leading and scaling coaching portal operations (from putting in touch candidates /coaches to completion of service)
		○ Defining, monitoring eventually automating the processes
	• Leading coach recruitment
		○ Establishing recruitment criteria
		○ Refining sales pitch
		○ Finding and recruiting coaches
	• Leading portal quality control process
		○ Setting up customer feedback mechanism
		○ Defining and maintaining coach ratings process
		○ Training programs for coaches
	• Co-leading the platform economics analysis with the CEO
		○ Defining platform margin strategy
		○ Estimating and monitoring coach LTV (Lifetime Value)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
The exact COO role scope is not fully defined and can be moulded to suit a candidate that has a good personal and cultural fit, but the main responsibility is expected to be the Coaching Portal, which will be a marketplace that connects applicants with freelance coaches for help on MBA applications.

Therefore the role would include:
• Leading and scaling coaching portal operations (from putting in touch candidates /coaches to completion of service)
○ Defining, monitoring eventually automating the processes
• Leading coach recruitment
○ Establishing recruitment criteria
○ Refining sales pitch
○ Finding and recruiting coaches
• Leading portal quality control process
○ Setting up customer feedback mechanism
○ Defining and maintaining coach ratings process
○ Training programs for coaches
• Co-leading the platform economics analysis with the CEO
○ Defining platform margin strategy
○ Estimating and monitoring coach LTV (Lifetime Value)
